name: make caramel
ingredients: 1  egg yoke,125 g condenced milk,3tsp  instant coffee,1,1/2cups  water,3tsp  gelatine,1  eggwhite,60 g cashew
method: Crack the egg yoke into a bowl, then add the condenced milk and instant coffee, and mix until a nice caramel is formed. Do not allow to bubble. ingredients: 1 kg corn beef,3 medium potatoes,3 medium carrots,1 cup frozen peas,4  eggs,6  pickles,1 cup mayonnaise,1 tbsp dill

Meanwhile, cook your frozen peas (1 cup) according to package directions. I use the kind that can be steamed in the package in the microwave. When they are done, set them aside to cool. Toss the carrots and a cup of steamed peas into the bowl with the potatoes. Peel and dice your hardboiled eggs (4). Add the meat if using and mix everything together gently before you add the mayonnaise (1 cup). method: Preheat the oven to 180°C before beginning your prep. Rinse the bream (450g) or your choice of fish (cod, seabass, or catfish), remove any scales that may remain, as well as fins. # Recipe for Baked Fish with Vegetables

## Ingredients
- 50g courgette
- 40g lemon
- 50g red bell pepper
- 30g cherry tomatoes
- 30g red onion
- Freshly squeezed lemon juice
- Olive oil
- Salt
- Black pepper
- Provence herbs (1/2 tsp)
- Fish (type and amount not specified)

## Instructions

### Preparation
Peel the red onion and slice it into half rings. Cut the courgettes into thin rounds and the red pepper into medium slices. Halve the cherry tomatoes.

### Seasoning the Fish
Drizzle the fish with freshly squeezed lemon juice and a sprinkle of olive oil, then season with salt and a grind of black pepper.

### Cooking the Vegetables
Heat a frying pan over medium heat with a little oil just to prevent sticking and help with browning. Sauté the chopped vegetables with the Provence herbs (1/2 tsp) and salt and pepper.

### Baking the Fish
On a flat baking tray, place the fish on tin foil with the shiny side down so as not to reflect the heat, you can also use baking paper. Stuff the fish with the roasted vegetables and bake for 15 minutes.

### Optional Garnish
It is also nice to top the fish with fresh fennel for baking, if you should have any around.

### Serving Suggestions
After baking, take the fish out of the oven and place on a platter, garnish with either fresh or roasted cherry tomatoes, roasted whole garlic cloves (these can be done when baking the fish) and wedges of lemon. The fish also goes nicely with baby new potatoes and garlic butter.
